text:
In short, I have been quite busy! Been recently going through onboarding and getting up to speed on projects so it has been quite an adventure! I am hoping to stream this weekend and get back into a bit more of a normal schedule with streaming as I am working on a new personal project as well as continuing development of Javis. I want to discuss an idea I have with my employers at some point about incorporating streaming into my day job and my open source work as I do a lot of it! As I was getting hired they really loved the educational outreach portion of the stream that I maintained while I worked through projects. I don't think they are opposed but not comfortable asking about it _just_ yet.

I'll update more in the future as I find out more.

Keep rocking on! :deciduous_tree:

text: I'm also trying to get the opportunity to stream what I work on during the day. I think it's great if one manages to do that!

elements.text: I'm also trying to get the opportunity to stream what I work on during the day. I think it's great if one manages to do that!

text: Yea! It is tough because some stuff I do concerns private datasets and keys while other times I am just working on contributions to different Julia packages. How goes the negotiations on your end <@UDB26738Q>?

elements.text: Yea! It is tough because some stuff I do concerns private datasets and keys while other times I am just working on contributions to different Julia packages. How goes the negotiations on your end

text: Honestly, I don't think I need to negotiate much with my boss, I'm pretty sure he would be happy. However I work on projects, I need to find a project in Julia whose PI would be happy for me to do it. Let's say that at the moment the struggle is to find projects in Julia :joy: but I'm working on it
